ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 70
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I too have experienced this dream state, where my unconscious body continued the Hymn of Restoration as I lay prostrate.  I had been poisoned by a giant
ygData.messageBody:
>Subject: Re: Out of bard experience
>
> > Roop Dirump wrote:
><snip story of sining while unconscious>
>
>This happened to me a while back while killing Dervs in NRo. But
>I stayed unconscious long enough for my friends to re-appear back
>in Freeport and run back to the camp!
>
>Mully
>Veeshan

I too have experienced this dream state, where my unconscious body continued
the Hymn of Restoration as I lay prostrate. I had been poisoned by a giant
spider and collapsed as I looted it's corpse. Twice I stood up, only to
fall again as poison and hymn battled with each other. Hymn won out, and I
limped back to the nearest guard to regain my strength. Just another one of
those EQ magic moments!

Elegor Mandreskal of the Soerbaird.
Fennin Ro.
